description: The ARKTRIBE file is one of 3 save files that ARK: Survival Evolved gamers commonly encounter. The .ARK file contains information about a world and the .ARKPROFILE file contains information about a player profile.
ARKTRIBE files are saved by default by Steam installations of ARK: Survival Evolved in the following Windows directory:

common_filenames.description: [TribeID].arktribe - The name given to ARKTRIBE files is the ID of the tribe.
